column1: I see the little boy reaching up for the jar but also the little girl her hand up for a from the jar the well call her the mother is doing and the water is splashing the sink she can look out the window and see the lawn doing the and as I said before the water is coming out she doesnt seem to be aware of it and the little boy is going to get a bad fall on that stool the on full force and its coming out onto the floor
